creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of Mr. and Mrs. George McKay Reid
description: Sculptural abstraction featuring an elliptical red object that fills most of the picture plane; its center consists of a grey circle with interweaving yellow lines; heavy black lines around the object's center spiral outwards towards its border
medium: Color lithograph, aquatint, and drypoint, with additions in graphite, ballpoint pen, and marker on paper; studio proof
title: Fold-Out
